name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Wayne BATTLE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Wayne BATTLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Mozenter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Andrew B. Cohn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 497
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Wayne BATTLE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Robert B. Mozenter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Andrew B. Cohn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
